metadata.title: Professional Cinematography Shots - Veo 3 Prompts
metadata.description: Professional cinematography shot compositions for Veo 3 video generation

prompt_templates.name: Master Wide Shot
prompt_templates.description: Establishes the entire scene with full character visibility and environmental context

prompt_structure.base_prompt: Master wide shot of {subject} in {environment}, establishing shot, {camera_angle}, {lighting}, {mood}
prompt_structure.technical_specs: 8K resolution, cinematic aspect ratio 2.35:1, professional color grading
prompt_structure.camera_settings: wide angle lens, deep depth of field, stable camera work

examples.prompt: Master wide shot of a lone cowboy on horseback in a vast desert landscape, establishing shot, low angle camera, golden hour lighting, epic western mood, 8K resolution, cinematic aspect ratio 2.35:1, professional color grading, wide angle lens, deep depth of field, stable camera work
examples.expected_result: Epic establishing shot with dramatic scale

examples.prompt: Master wide shot of a modern glass office building in downtown cityscape, establishing shot, high angle camera, blue hour lighting, corporate professional mood, 8K resolution, cinematic aspect ratio 2.35:1, professional color grading, wide angle lens, deep depth of field, stable camera work

best_practices: Use deep depth of field to show entire scene
common_mistakes: Too much camera movement in establishing shots

prompt_templates.name: Medium Close-Up
prompt_templates.description: Frames subject from chest up, ideal for dialogue and emotional connection

prompt_structure.technical_specs: 4K resolution, shallow depth of field, professional color correction
prompt_structure.camera_settings: 85mm lens equivalent, f/2.8 aperture, steady focus

examples.prompt: Medium close-up of a business woman speaking confidently, professional demeanor, straight-on camera angle, soft key lighting, blurred office background, 4K resolution, shallow depth of field, professional color correction, 85mm lens equivalent, f/2.8 aperture, steady focus

Medium close-up of a chef explaining a recipe, passionate expression, slight low angle, warm kitchen lighting, blurred cooking equipment background, 4K resolution, shallow depth of field, professional color correction, 85mm lens equivalent, f/2.8 aperture, steady focus

best_practices: Use shallow depth of field for subject isolation
Ensure proper headroom and shoulder placement
Focus on facial expressions and gestures
common_mistakes: Too tight framing cutting off gestures

prompt_templates.name: Extreme Close-Up
prompt_templates.description: Focuses on specific details like eyes, hands, or objects for dramatic impact

prompt_structure.technical_specs: Ultra-sharp focus, macro lens effect, high contrast
prompt_structure.camera_settings: 100mm+ lens equivalent, very shallow DOF, precise focus

examples.prompt: Extreme close-up of intense blue eyes with tears forming, emotional vulnerability, soft rim lighting, detailed iris texture, ultra-sharp focus, macro lens effect, high contrast, 100mm+ lens equivalent, very shallow DOF, precise focus

Extreme close-up of weathered hands working with clay, artistic concentration, side lighting, rough skin texture, ultra-sharp focus, macro lens effect, high contrast, 100mm+ lens equivalent, very shallow DOF, precise focus

best_practices: Use for emotional or dramatic emphasis
Ensure razor-sharp focus on key detail
common_mistakes: Focus issues due to shallow DOF

technical_guidelines.color_grading_notes: Always specify professional color correction for consistency

usage_notes.prompt_combination: Can be combined with lighting and camera movement prompts
usage_notes.sequence_planning: Consider shot progression for narrative flow
usage_notes.platform_optimization: Adjust aspect ratios based on delivery platform
